name: NSUserAppleScriptTask
desc: An object that executes AppleScript scripts.

items.name: func execute(withAppleEvent: NSAppleEventDescriptor?, completionHandler: NSUserAppleScriptTask.CompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Execute the AppleScript script by sending it the specified Apple event.

items.name: typealias NSUserAppleScriptTask.CompletionHandler
items.desc: Implement this block to retrieve the result of the AppleScript executed by execute(withAppleEvent:completionHandler:).
